localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.Title: SpellBook Basics
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.Description: Learn the fundamentals of using SpellBook for comprehensive spell management
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.Welcome.Title: Welcome to SpellBook!
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.Welcome.Content:
SpellBook is a comprehensive spell management system for Foundry VTT. This tour will guide you through the core features of the SpellBook interface.

Use the arrow buttons or keyboard arrows to navigate through the tour. You can exit at any time by clicking the X button.
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.Opening.Title: The SpellBook Interface
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.Opening.Content:
This is the main SpellBook interface. Here you can view all your character's spells, prepare them for use, and manage your spell slots.

The interface is organized by spell levels and provides quick access to all spell-related features.
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.ClassTabs.Title: Class Tabs
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.ClassTabs.Content:
If your character has multiple spellcasting classes, you'll see tabs on the right side. Each tab shows the spells available to that specific class.

Click a tab to switch between your different spellcasting classes. This is especially useful for multiclass characters!
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.SpellLevels.Title: Spell Levels
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.SpellLevels.Conte:
Spells are organized by level, from cantrips (level 0) up to 9th-level spells. Each level section shows:

• The number of prepared spells at that level
• All available spells you can prepare
• Spell details and metadata

Click the arrow icon to collapse or expand a spell level section.
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.Preparation.Title: Preparing Spells
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.Preparation.Conte:
Use these checkboxes to prepare or unprepare spells. Prepared spells are ready to cast and appear on your character sheet.

Some classes (like Wizards) must prepare spells from a larger list of known spells. Others (like Sorcerers) always have all their known spells prepared.

Changes are tracked live but not saved until you click the Save button.
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.SpellSlots.Title: Spell Slot Tracking
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.SpellSlots.Conten:
This area shows your spell slot usage and preparation limits:

• Current/Maximum prepared spells for each class
• Available spell slots per level
• Class-specific preparation rules

SpellBook automatically calculates your limits based on your class and level.
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.Filters.Title: Spell Filters
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.Filters.Content:
Use filters to quickly find spells:

• Search by name
• Filter by school, level, or casting time
• Show only prepared or ritual spells
• Advanced search operators for power users

Filters update instantly as you type or make selections. Click the gear icon to customize which filters are visible.
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.Sidebar.Title: Quick Actions Sidebar
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.Sidebar.Content:
The sidebar provides quick access to powerful features:

• Spell Comparison - Compare multiple spells side-by-side
• Favorites - Mark frequently used spells
• Notes - Add personal notes to spells
• Spell Analytics - View usage statistics
• Loadouts - Save and load preparation sets

You can collapse the sidebar using the arrow button to maximize spell viewing space.
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.Settings.Title: SpellBook Settings
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.Settings.Content:
Click the gear icon to open character-specific SpellBook settings:

• Configure spell list assignments
• Set preparation rules and enforcement
• Customize cantrip swapping behavior
• Configure ritual casting options
• Set up multiclass spellcasting

These settings are per-character, allowing different configurations for each of your actors.
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.Footer.Title: Save and Actions
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.Footer.Content:
The footer contains important action buttons:

• **Save** - Commits all preparation changes to your character
• **Reset** - Reverts changes back to last save (hold Shift for full reset)
• **Analytics** - Opens spell usage dashboard
• **Loadouts** - Quick-save and load preparation sets

Remember to save your changes before closing SpellBook!
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.NextSteps.Title: You're Ready to Go!
localization.SPELLBOOK.Tours.Basics.NextSteps.Content:
You now know the basics of SpellBook! Here are some recommended next steps:

• Try preparing some spells and clicking Save
• Experiment with filters to find specific spells
• Check out the Spell List Manager tour to learn about custom spell lists
• Explore the Analytics dashboard to track spell usage

For more advanced features, take the other available tours in the Tour Management window.
